short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save all your favorite bookmarks in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join Dewey to search, sort, organize, export all your bookmarks from ùïè/Twitter, LinkedIn, Bluesky, and any page of the web.
Add Dewey to your browser in seconds and bookmark posts on any of your favorite social media sites. We‚Äôll handle the rest.

Trusted by 35,000+ members to save their favorite content in a central hub.

üóÇ Organize
Built-in organization tools like folders, nested folders, and tags to control the clutter. Keep track of all your saved posts with ease and find what you're looking for in seconds.

üîé Search
Lightning-fast search of every bookmark, tag, author and note.

üì• Export
With Dewey‚Äôs export options, you can easily export your entire library with one click - formatted as CSV, searchable PDFs, or a Google Sheet spreadsheet. Even export all associated media like images and videos. It‚Äôs all yours.

ü§ù Share
Dewey lets you turn on public sharing of bookmark folders to collaborate with others, as well as RSS feeds for any folder you create.

‚ú® AI Bulk Tagging
Type a few keywords about your interests and our AI tags your bookmarks in bulk. No more hours wasted manually tagging. Our AI tool will let you review a proposed sample set before applying bulk tags across all content. Adjust and refine the suggestions until perfectly aligned with how you categorize information.

‚óÜ And more‚Ä¶
From dark mode to keyboard shortcuts and Google Sheets integration, we‚Äôre constantly on the hunt to find small but impactful quality of life improvements. We think the internet is amazing and want to help you find, and remember, your favorite content.

Note: You must have an existing Dewey account to use this extension. If you do not, you will be asked to create one after installing this extension.
If you are not already a subscriber, you can get a free 7-day trial with no credit card upfront. At the end of the trial, you will not be charged unless you choose to subscribe.
